name: Marquee
description: An infinite scrolling component that can be used to display text, images, or videos.

metadata.title: Marquee
metadata.description: An infinite scrolling component that can be used to display text, images, or videos.
metadata.author: dillionverma

props.name: className
props.description: The class name to apply to the component.

props.name: reverse
props.description: Whether or not to reverse the direction of the marquee.

props.name: pauseOnHover
props.description: Whether or not to pause the marquee when the user hovers over the component.

props.name: vertical
props.description: Whether or not to display the marquee vertically.

props.name: children
props.description: The content to display in the marquee.

props.name: repeat
props.description: The number of times to repeat the content.
